text: report of injury to dog or cat amend the subdivision heading preceding rsa to read as follows report of injury to dog or cat report of injury to dog or cat amend rsa to read as follows report of injury to dog or cat the driver of any vehicle who knowingly strikes a dog or cat and fails to report the incident to the dog s owner or custodian or the cat s owner or custodian or to a police officer as soon as possible shall be guilty of a violation
